name: Interstellar Plunderer
description:
Interstellar Plunderer is a single-player indie arcade-style 3D roguelike space shooter game made with the Godot engine aiming to capture the feel of a retro game with modern mechanics.



  • Select one of the multiple unique spaceships, each with its own special skill and playstyle as you blast your way through deadly settings across the galaxy.
  • Level up each run to choose from a roster of impactful and powerful upgrade cards that will turn you from planetary peasant to galactic warlord! Earn achievements to unlock even more upgrade cards to aid you in future runs.
  • Get plunder from golden asteroids to spend in between games on awesome upgrades for your owned ships and even buy new ones with that cold-hard cash.
  • Join the battle against dangerous space pirates, lethal aliens, and intergalactic law enforcement as you race between stages.
  • Test your skills against deadly boss fights with original music, that will push your ship to its very limit.
  • Strive for the highest score on the global leaderboard to prove that you are the greatest pirate in the universe!!!

How far can you go?
